DOC.brief_summary: Feasibility study evaluate CARTO™ XP EP Navigation System V9 SOUNDSTAR 3D Diagnostic Ultrasound Catheter .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation CARTO™ XP EP Navigation System v9 Biosense Webster SOUNDSTAR 3D Diagnostic Ultrasound . A Feasibility Study
DOC.detailed_description: To construct geometric representation heart chamber use intracardiac ultrasound.The Carto™ XP Electrophysiology ( EP ) Navigation System v9 intend acquire real-time catheter base cardiac electrophysiogical map .
DOC.criteria: Subjects undergo EPS study Ablation eligible study . Age 18 year old Signed Patient Informed Consent Form Patients inadequate vascular access Patients follow criterion exclude : Women pregnant Age < 18 year Any Contraindication clinical procedure Sepsis Major coagulation abnormality Presence intracardiac thrombus Unstable angina Uncontrolled Heart failure Deep Vein Thrombosis Significant peripheral vascular disease
